column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////My mouth is watering just writing this. I now live in Seattle
column2: WA and would give anything to have a Lou Malnati's pop up here! I know Chicago is best known for their deep dish
column4: the thin crust is where it's at...Both are actually amazing
column5: but the thin has the most perfect consistency and you can control how much you're eating a little easier :) My office still orders this regularly and it never gets old!
